amendment.description: An amendment considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 180. The amendment strikes section 103 which directs the Secretary of the Army to include an alternatives analysis of a multipurpose Auburn Dam as a part of the Sacramento District's current American River watershed long-term study.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
